name: PrismPay for WooCommerce
author: PrismPay

sections.description:
PrismPay for WooCommerce

makes your website ready to use PrismPay Payment Gateway, to accept credit/debit cards on your e-commerce store checkout page.

WooCommerce 3.x Compatible

Features

  1. Accept Credit/Debit Cards right on your website.
  2. No redirecting on other url.
  3. Easy to install and configure.
  4. Option to configure success & failure message.

short_description: PrismPay for WooCommerce extends the functionality of WooCommerce to accept payments from credit/debit cards on your checkout page using PrismPay Inte …
